revised_title: Magnetic Declination at Kew Observatory, 1890-1900: Analysis and Disturbance Classification
tldr: This study investigates the magnetic declination at Kew Observatory from 1890 to 1900, analyzing the data from all days to understand the relationship between quiet and disturbed days. The author discusses the methods used to classify and smooth the data, as well as the annual variation and sunspot relationships observed during this period.
